exception.name: PS/PDF font exception (2017-08-17)
exception.notes: Author-suggested standard header language recommends use with AGPL-3.0

optional.p: The font and related files in this directory are distributed under the GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3 (see the file COPYING), with the following exemption:

text.p: As a special exception, permission is granted to include these font programs in a Postscript or PDF file that consists of a document that contains text to be displayed or printed using this font, regardless of the conditions or license applying to the document itself.
